Sentencas: Effects of small amount of Ca doping in La site in LaCoO3-based oxide on the synthesis and electrical conductivity were investigated by using X-ray diffraction (XRD), differential scanning calorimetry and thermogravimetry (DSC/ TG), ordinary four-probe dc measurement methods.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of La0.8Sr0.2-xCaxCo0.9Fe0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: La0.8Sr0.2-x,CaxCo0.9Fe0.1O3-delta ( LSCCF, 0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 0.1) prepared by solid reaction synthesis is all of a single phase and the calcined process may be divided into three stages: (1) decomposition of reactants; (2) formation of LaCoO3-based oxides; and 3) formation of LSCCF solid solution.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of La0.8Sr0.2-xCaxCo0.9Fe0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The maximum of electrical conductivity of the LSCCF composites is above 100 S .
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of La0.8Sr0.2-xCaxCo0.9Fe0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: cm(-1) and the conduction mechanism is attributed to the adiabatic-hopping of p-type small polarons.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical properties of La0.8Sr0.2-xCaxCo0.9Fe0.1O3-δ
